name: turbo-crash
description: Memory and CPU stress testing with Turbo

scripts.crash: turbo run stress1 stress2 stress3 stress4 stress5 stress6 stress7 stress8 stress9 stress10 --concurrency=10
scripts.crash-sequential: turbo run stress1 stress2 stress3 stress4 stress5 stress6 stress7 stress8 stress9 stress10 --concurrency=1
